outputs.output_descr: High-level advisory support to the Ministry of Social Policy provided for the revision and/or elaboration of the necessary legislative documents and strategies in key areas of the social sector reform, namely pension reform, social security, social assistance and social services. Capacity of the Ministry of Social Policy for the successful implementation of the social sector reforms enhanced.

project_descr: Support to Social Sector Reform in Ukraine
project_title: Support to Social Sector Reform in Ukraine
